title: Teacher realized error added 10 points to students

content.prompt: A test on schizophrenia spectrum symptoms with normally distributed results was returned to a class of 100 students. Later, the teacher realized an error was made and added 10 points to each student’s score. Which of the following must have changed as a result of the increase in scores?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
